alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Central Washington; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 11:10AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect Northern Somerset... Washington...northern Hancock...Piscataquis...southeastern Aroostook and Penobscot Counties... At 1106 AM EST...An area of heavy snow was moving north from the Downeast region at around 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Bangor, Old Town, Houlton, Bucksport, Millinocket, Dover-Foxcroft, Dexter, Newport, Calais, Greenville, Guilford, Howland, Patten, Danforth, Vanceboro, Mount Katahdin, Ripogenus, Brownville Junction and Orono. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 160 and 304. US Highway 1 near Dennysville, and between Princeton and Houlton. State Highway 11 between Corinna and Patten. State Highway 9 between Dixmont and Baring. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop to less than a quarter mile this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches are possible.
